name: Project Cube V1.4.4
description:
Official Site:

eklecticstudios.zohosites.com

What Is It?

Project Cube is a Minecraft-like game made with HTML, CSS, and JS.

What Do You Get?

You get the FPS friendly version, the normal version, the quality version, bragging rights, and knowing that you supported a developer.

Design

Project Cube is designed to look like Minecraft, but without the copyright infringements. Both have their ups and downs, so it just depends on what you want most. There is a compare chart on the official website.

Gameplay

Project Cube is an open-world game with no way to have your creation obliterated, plenty of blocks, and no rules. All you have to do is start building!

Recommended Specs

CPU: 1GHz
GPU: 512MB
RAM: 2GB

Known Bugs (Thanks Guys!)
  • While Flying, You Can Go Straight Thru Any Block Above You
Questions/Comments?

If you have any questions, leave a comment or contact us at eclecticstudios.contact@gmail.com.
